title: 492-Sean Evans-Your Mom's House with Christina P and Tom Segura
description:
One of our all time faves is the master of all that is spicy. Mr. Hot Ones himself, Sean Evans, is inside Studio Jeans. 

By now you must have seen Hot Ones, the First We Feast concept that puts celebs in the hot seat, eating progressively hotter wings while answering questions from the best host in the game, our guest, Sean. 

This one will go into the vaults as a fan favorite. There's love in the air, there's tons of water and the denim is thick here.
